summary: TAKATA RECALL -- IT IS ONE YEAR SINCE THE RECALL WAS ISSUED.  FORD STATED TODAY THAT STILL DON'T HAVE ANY INFLATORS IN MANUFACTURE FOR REPLACEMENT.  THE CAR WILL BE PAST ITS LIFESPAN BEFORE THE RECALL IS COMPLETE MEANWHILE ANY PASSENGER IN THE CAR IS AT RISK.  THIS IS AN UNSATISFACTORY RESPONSE TO A MAJOR SAFETY RISK. NOTHING HAS HAPPENED YET!
